document_data.caption: A map showing Torriage Wood on the east coast of Callidyrr.
document_data.name: Torriage Wood
document_data.mainbody: '''Torriage Wood''' was a small forest located in the kingdom of [[Callidyrr]] on the island of [[Alaron]] within the [[Moonshae Isles]].{{Cite interactive atlas}}{{Cite dungeon/196/Backdrop: The Moonshae Isles}}
document_data.Geography: Torriage Wood was located on the eastern coast of central Alaron where the [[Swanmay River]] met the [[Sea of Swords]]. The forest was located on the river's north bank. The western edge of the forest bordered the [[Central Plains (Alaron)|Central Plains]]. It covered roughly {{SI|100|sq mi|k|long=yes}} of land.
